content:
Thanks everyone, for making this edition happen!

I've made a celebratory and thank-you post here: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/88623

(Please let me know about all the things and people I have forgotten!)
@Mara Thank you so much for all the work you've done on the edition, and thank you for taking the time to compile that gratitude-filled post.
I took the liberty of pinning this, and I beg no forgiveness :)
I suggest keeping that until release, at least
Thank you so much! :heart:
